channel.title: Why isn't SCAR working for me?!?!?!?!?!
channel.description:
FFs some people say i need SCAR 2.3, or 2.2... WELL I CANT GET THAT!... i can only get 3.6 or 3.7 idk!! well i downloaded 3.6, cuz it was the first download on Starblaster100's Tut.... I have a EssMiner... From Solumn Wishes...
And i got this error..
Include file C:\PROGRAM FILES\SCAR 3.06\includes\SSi2.txt does not exist. Include file C:\PROGRAM FILES\SCAR 3.06\includes\boxbreaker.txt does not exist. Include file C:\PROGRAM FILES\SCAR 3.06\includes\RedXIIsFordCracker.txt does not exist. Failed when compiling
^^... now, he/she said i need to download the includes... so i went to file, DOWNLOAD INCLUDES. And so i did... Then, the same problem happened. so i downloaded them again, and overwrote them... And it happened again FFS!!!! Every SCAR SCRIPT I USE, IT ALWAYS.... ALWAYS!!!! HAS AN A ERROR IN IT... People say "Omfg thanks! this works perfectly, tyvm!!!"
"Woot finally, an ess miner that actually works :D"!
"Yay i got my ess miner to work!"
=.=... Why doesn't it work for me...................................
Let me show you a few errors from different SCAR scripts... Here is a woodcutting one.
Line 32: [Error] (32:4): Unknown identifier 'LoggedIn' in script C:\windows\TEMP\Rar$DI00.963\WoodCutting.scar
AGILITY...
[Error] (29:1): Unexpected end of file
FIREMAKING....
Line 48: [Error] (48:4): Unknown identifier 'InChatMulti' in script C:\windows\TEMP\Rar$DI06.733\Firemaking.scar
FISHING...
Line 58: [Error] (58:1): Unknown identifier 'GameTab' in script C:\windows\TEMP\Rar$DI09.013\Fishing.scar
FLETCHING...
[Error] (40:1): Unexpected end of file
RUNECRAFTING...
Line 62: [Error] (62:10): Unknown identifier 'LoggedIn' in script C:\windows\TEMP\Rar$DI14.080\RuneCrafting.scar
MINING....
Line 74: [Error] (74:1): Unknown identifier 'MouseFlag' in script C:\windows\TEMP\Rar$DI17.715\Mining.scar
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Look, please can someone tell me why this is happening!!? IT HAPPENS ON EVERY SCAR SCRIPT I TRY TO START FFS!!!!!!!![/b]

item.title: Why isn't SCAR working for me?!?!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Why isn't SCAR working for me?!?!?!?!?!

item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

FFs some people say i need SCAR 2.3, or 2.2… WELL I CANT GET THAT!.. i can only get 3.6 or 3.7 idk!! well i downloaded 3.6, cuz it was the first download on Starblaster100’s Tut… I have a EssMiner… From Solumn Wishes…

Failed when compiling

^^… now, he/she said i need to download the includes… so i went to file, DOWNLOAD INCLUDES. And so i did… Then, the same problem happened. so i downloaded them again, and overwrote them… And it happened again FFS!!! Every SCAR SCRIPT I USE, IT ALWAYS… ALWAYS!!! “Woot finally, an ess miner that actually works :D”!

Look, please can someone tell me why this is happening!!? IT HAPPENS ON EVERY SCAR SCRIPT I TRY TO START FFS!!!
